title: PLAYED BY YOU
description: LUCK, HOPE and that thing we chase... LOVE is only ever around the corner - sometimes you just need to be shown when to turn...~A group of young professionals go to dizzying heights to destroy or bed each other while on a business trip in glitzy Singapore.A NOVELLA - romantic thriller - 28,000 words, 14 chaptersWARNING: contains some strong language & sexual scenes.
author: H.C. Elliston
